https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Collect a boat from the chest.
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: You need supplies for the voyage ahead. Collect a **boat** [][0] from the **chest** [][1].

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Head to the end of the dock.
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: Boats are much easier than swimming in open water! Head to the end of the dock to hop aboard.

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Head across the open seas to the cod.
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: Grab the oars and pilot your boat across the open seas to catch the **cod** [][0].

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Use a loop to get to the dolphin.
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: Let's feed the cod to the **dolphin** [][0]. Use a repeat until block to get across the ocean faster.

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Explore the shipwreck to reach the chest.
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: There's a **nautilus shell** [][0] hidden somewhere! Explore the shipwreck to reach the **chest** [][1].

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Navigate through the ice to reach the salmon.
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: Looks freezing out there! Catch a **salmon** [][0] on your way to the underwater ruins.

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Search these underwater ruins for a chest.
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: You found the underwater ruins. Search the sandstone for a **chest** [][0] containing **prismarine** [][1] treasure.

authored_hints.aquatic7: You can use the if path block to help you make the right turns.

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: First icebergs, now lava? Get through this volcanic island and find the **tropical fish** [][0] in the coral reef.

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Use the coral as waypoints to reach the treasure.
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: You made it to the reef, now search for the **Heart of the Sea** [][0] ! Use the blue and red coral to reach the treasure **chest** [][1].

authored_hints.voyage_aquatic_9a: See the red and blue coral blocks? Use them as guideposts to turn right and left through the reef.

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Get to the entrance of this Ocean Monument.
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: There is a **squid** [][0] hiding somewhere in this Ocean Monument, can you find it?

authored_hints.voyage_aquatic_10a: See the **Sea Lanterns** [][0]? How can you use a conditional with them to get through the Ocean Monument?

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Build a conduit with Prismarine inside the Ocean Monument.
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: Build a wall of **prismarine** [][0] around the black concrete. This will activate the **conduit** [][1] and complete your challenge!

https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.short_instructions: Design your own underwater environment, itâ€™s up to you!
https://studio.code.org/s/aquatic/lesson.long_instructions: Congratulations! The open aquatic world awaits you. Build a coral reef! A volcano! A shipwreck! It's up to you.
